newsitem.title: UK: Burmah Castrol year profits top forecasts.
newsitem.headline: Burmah Castrol year profits top forecasts.

text.p: NOTE - After-tax profit is after minority interests but excludes an exceptional gain of 6.4 million stg in 1996.
Analysts had forecast after-tax profits in a range between 139.5 and 141.5 million stg.
Burmah said it expected to pay a total final cash dividend consisting of a final base foreign income dividend (FID) of 24.8p together with an FID enhancement of about 6.2p per share.
The interim, conventional dividend, was 12p versus 11p in 1995.
Full company name - Burmah Castrol Plc. --London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717
